text: Guillermo del Toro. When Natalie Portman introduced the Best Director candidates at the Golden Globes as the “ all - male nominees, ” it inspired a bit of controversy. Onscreen, it appeared as if the directors — Martin McDonagh, Christopher Nolan, Ridley Scott, Steven Spielberg, and Guillermo del Toro — might have been a bit miffed. However, you can at least consider the smiling eye roll that del Toro gave to the camera to be a sheepish reaction instead of an offended one. The Shape of Water filmmaker and Globe recipient for Best Director told IndieWire that he approves of Portman ’ s comment, “ I think it was great! She should say exactly what she feels.
